paragraphs.body: Dark Into Light is a game hosted by Nick.com, based on the television series ${link_0}. The player runs through scenery from the show as either ${link_1} or ${link_2}, bending at or jumping over enemies and obstacles in the way. It can be used to unlock exclusive images from ${link_3}.
paragraphs.text: Dark Into Light is a game hosted by Nick.com, based on the television series The Legend of Korra. The player runs through scenery from the show as either Korra or Bolin, bending at or jumping over enemies and obstacles in the way. It can be used to unlock exclusive images from Book Two: Spirits.

paragraphs.body: Play as Korra or Bolin and beat as many missions and stages as possible to restore balance and unlock new abilities.
paragraphs.text: Play as Korra or Bolin and beat as many missions and stages as possible to restore balance and unlock new abilities.

paragraphs.body: Up arrow or W — Jump
paragraphs.text: Up arrow or W — Jump

paragraphs.body: Left arrow or A — Move left
paragraphs.text: Left arrow or A — Move left

paragraphs.body: Right arrow or D — Move right
paragraphs.text: Right arrow or D — Move right

paragraphs.body: Clicking near Korra — Waterbend
paragraphs.text: Clicking near Korra — Waterbend

paragraphs.body: Clicking far away — Firebend
paragraphs.text: Clicking far away — Firebend

paragraphs.body: Clicking and holding for two seconds — Earthbend
paragraphs.text: Clicking and holding for two seconds — Earthbend

paragraphs.body: Double tapping arrow keys or A/D — Dash past enemies by airbending
paragraphs.text: Double tapping arrow keys or A/D — Dash past enemies by airbending

paragraphs.body: Jump against the wall and press in the opposite direction — Wall jump (unlocked at level four)
paragraphs.text: Jump against the wall and press in the opposite direction — Wall jump (unlocked at level four)

paragraphs.body: Up arrow or W twice — Double jump (unlocked at level seven)
paragraphs.text: Up arrow or W twice — Double jump (unlocked at level seven)

paragraphs.body: Up arrow or W twice and left/right arrow or A/D — Air dash (unlocked at level ten)
paragraphs.text: Up arrow or W twice and left/right arrow or A/D — Air dash (unlocked at level ten)

paragraphs.body: Defeat multiple enemies in succession without getting hit to fill the energy bar underneath Korra's health bar — Avatar State (unlocked at level twelve)
paragraphs.text: Defeat multiple enemies in succession without getting hit to fill the energy bar underneath Korra's health bar — Avatar State (unlocked at level twelve)

paragraphs.body: The game is played through different stages. Upon starting the game, the player will be presented with four menus, one for controls, one for unlocking codes, one for exclusive content and one for playing the game. This link will lead a player to the menu for stages, where there are several stages they can choose from each with numerous missions in them. The default mission for the stage is opened with a brief conversation between Korra and another character from the series. There are four levels set in the South Pole, one in Republic City, two in the Fire Nation (set in the same location), two in the Eastern Air Temple, and one in Ba Sing Se.
paragraphs.text: The game is played through different stages. Upon starting the game, the player will be presented with four menus, one for controls, one for unlocking codes, one for exclusive content and one for playing the game. This link will lead a player to the menu for stages, where there are several stages they can choose from each with numerous missions in them. The default mission for the stage is opened with a brief conversation between Korra and another character from the series. There are four levels set in the South Pole, one in Republic City, two in the Fire Nation (set in the same location), two in the Eastern Air Temple, and one in Ba Sing Se.

paragraphs.body: Once the player completes a certain amount of missions, Korra will level up. At higher levels, she will learn new moves including wall jump at level four, double jump at level seven, air dash at level ten, and Avatar State at level twelve.
paragraphs.text: Once the player completes a certain amount of missions, Korra will level up. At higher levels, she will learn new moves including wall jump at level four, double jump at level seven, air dash at level ten, and Avatar State at level twelve.

paragraphs.body: This stage begins with a conversation between Korra and ${link_0} that goes as follows:
paragraphs.text: This stage begins with a conversation between Korra and Tenzin that goes as follows:

paragraphs.body: Tenzin: Korra! Clearly you need more training to grasp the depths of your spiritual connections.
paragraphs.text: Tenzin: Korra! Clearly you need more training to grasp the depths of your spiritual connections.

paragraphs.body: Korra: I'm the Avatar! And I have complete control over my powers. I'll prove it!
paragraphs.text: Korra: I'm the Avatar! And I have complete control over my powers. I'll prove it!

paragraphs.body: Tenzin instructs Korra through the stage, which is played in the ${link_0}. He tells the player the controls, and the player works through the stage using bending to destroy dummies and clear passageways. Upon making the way through the course, the player will reach a fountain with the waterbending symbol above it. Upon passing this, the player is healed. If the player heads up and to the left they will find a secret passageway with coins in it, or if they continue right they will eventually complete this stage.
paragraphs.text: Tenzin instructs Korra through the stage, which is played in the Southern Water Tribe. He tells the player the controls, and the player works through the stage using bending to destroy dummies and clear passageways. Upon making the way through the course, the player will reach a fountain with the waterbending symbol above it. Upon passing this, the player is healed. If the player heads up and to the left they will find a secret passageway with coins in it, or if they continue right they will eventually complete this stage.

paragraphs.body: The tutorial also has a secret mission that is unlocked with a code from the trivia game to find Tenzin in fifty seconds in order to get a reward of one hundred energy orbs. Tenzin is in the special location with the other energy orbs.
paragraphs.text: The tutorial also has a secret mission that is unlocked with a code from the trivia game to find Tenzin in fifty seconds in order to get a reward of one hundred energy orbs. Tenzin is in the special location with the other energy orbs.

paragraphs.body: In general, each stage of the game other than the tutorial consists of a series of standard missions that are achieved through similar means, but consist of slightly altered parameters. The following missions are a template that describes the objectives of the stages following the tutorial stage:
paragraphs.text: In general, each stage of the game other than the tutorial consists of a series of standard missions that are achieved through similar means, but consist of slightly altered parameters. The following missions are a template that describes the objectives of the stages following the tutorial stage:

paragraphs.body: This mission is unlocked upon clearing the preceding stage and is completed by simply reaching the Water Tribe emblem on the flag at the end of the stage.
paragraphs.text: This mission is unlocked upon clearing the preceding stage and is completed by simply reaching the Water Tribe emblem on the flag at the end of the stage.

paragraphs.body: This mission is unlocked upon clearing the first mission of any given stage and requires the stage to be completed within the given time limit. Each stage has more than one mission of this manner, with each requiring the level to be completed in a slightly quicker time.
paragraphs.text: This mission is unlocked upon clearing the first mission of any given stage and requires the stage to be completed within the given time limit. Each stage has more than one mission of this manner, with each requiring the level to be completed in a slightly quicker time.

paragraphs.body: A counter appears at the bottom right of the screen, and orange text counts down the time left to complete the stage.
paragraphs.text: A counter appears at the bottom right of the screen, and orange text counts down the time left to complete the stage.

paragraphs.body: This mission is unlocked upon clearing the first mission of any given stage and is completed by defeating the given number of ${link_0}.
paragraphs.text: This mission is unlocked upon clearing the first mission of any given stage and is completed by defeating the given number of dark spirits.

paragraphs.body: A counter appears at the bottom right of the screen, and purple text counts down the number of enemies the player has defeated. Rather than stopping at the Water Tribe emblem, the mission is finished when the counter reaches zero.
paragraphs.text: A counter appears at the bottom right of the screen, and purple text counts down the number of enemies the player has defeated. Rather than stopping at the Water Tribe emblem, the mission is finished when the counter reaches zero.

paragraphs.body: This mission is unlocked upon clearing the first mission in any given stage and is completed by collecting the given number of energy orbs.
section: Collect 'X' energy orbs in this stage
paragraphs.text: This mission is unlocked upon clearing the first mission in any given stage and is completed by collecting the given number of energy orbs.

paragraphs.body: A counter appears at the bottom right of the screen, and blue text counts down the number of energy orbs the player has yet to collect. Rather than stopping at the goal post, the mission is finished when the counter reaches zero.
section: Collect 'X' energy orbs in this stage
paragraphs.text: A counter appears at the bottom right of the screen, and blue text counts down the number of energy orbs the player has yet to collect. Rather than stopping at the goal post, the mission is finished when the counter reaches zero.

paragraphs.body: This mission is unlocked upon clearing the first mission in any given stage and is completed by defeating the given number of Dark spirits with the given time limit.
section: Defeat 'X' enemies in this stage in '#:##'
paragraphs.text: This mission is unlocked upon clearing the first mission in any given stage and is completed by defeating the given number of Dark spirits with the given time limit.

paragraphs.body: Two counters appear at the bottom right of the screen, one for the number of enemies yet to be defeated and one for the timer. Rather than stopping at the goal post, the mission is finished when the counter reaches zero.

paragraphs.body: This mission is unlocked upon clearing the first mission in any given stage and is completed by defeating the given number of Dark spirits without taking damage.

section: Defeat 'X' enemies in this stage taking no damage
paragraphs.text: A counter appears at the bottom right of the screen, and purple text counts down the number of enemies the player has defeated. Rather than stopping at the Water Tribe emblem, the mission is finished when the counter reaches zero.

paragraphs.body: This mission is unlocked upon entering the correct code in the Code Input section of the main menu. There is a code corresponding to each stage that unlocks this mission. The code is obtained after successfully completing the trivia game, which consists of ten quiz questions from the show; the code for any stage can be seen on the ${link_0} page. The stuffed animal is found in a certain hidden location in the level and will appear in the same location every time this mission is attempted. The reward of one hundred energy orbs is only received upon completing the mission for the first time.
section: Find the stuffed animal and earn one hundred energy orbs
paragraphs.text: This mission is unlocked upon entering the correct code in the Code Input section of the main menu. There is a code corresponding to each stage that unlocks this mission. The code is obtained after successfully completing the trivia game, which consists of ten quiz questions from the show; the code for any stage can be seen on the trivia game page. The stuffed animal is found in a certain hidden location in the level and will appear in the same location every time this mission is attempted. The reward of one hundred energy orbs is only received upon completing the mission for the first time.

paragraphs.body: This stage is unlocked upon clearing Civil Wars and takes place in the set for ${link_0}. In this stage, the player plays as Bolin in his Nuktuk costume. The only moves the player has as Bolin is running, jumping, and wall jump. Before the stage begins, Varrick tells Bolin no one will root for North after they see their production. Bolin says he's a movers superstar, and that Nuktuk is a man of action with a heart of gold. Unlike other stages, the missions in this stage are focused on successfully crossing the set and remaining on the screen, as the focus shifts through the level. The missions consist of:

links.body: The Adventures of Nuktuk: Hero of the South

paragraphs.text: This stage is unlocked upon clearing Civil Wars and takes place in the set for The Adventures of Nuktuk: Hero of the South. In this stage, the player plays as Bolin in his Nuktuk costume. The only moves the player has as Bolin is running, jumping, and wall jump. Before the stage begins, Varrick tells Bolin no one will root for North after they see their production. Bolin says he's a movers superstar, and that Nuktuk is a man of action with a heart of gold. Unlike other stages, the missions in this stage are focused on successfully crossing the set and remaining on the screen, as the focus shifts through the level. The missions consist of:

paragraphs.text: Defeat 20 enemies in this stage, taking no damage

paragraphs.body: Defeat the lizard Spirit (unlocked from completing the ninth quiz)
paragraphs.text: Defeat the lizard Spirit (unlocked from completing the ninth quiz)

paragraphs.body: To defeat the lizard spirit, the player must draw the lizard's attention and time their jump to avoid its attack. The lizard can only be damaged for a brief interval after it misses an attack and hits its head against a wall. The player can tell that the lizard can be damaged by looking at the color of its glow. If it glows blue, it can be damaged.
paragraphs.text: To defeat the lizard spirit, the player must draw the lizard's attention and time their jump to avoid its attack. The lizard can only be damaged for a brief interval after it misses an attack and hits its head against a wall. The player can tell that the lizard can be damaged by looking at the color of its glow. If it glows blue, it can be damaged.

paragraphs.body: This stage is unlocked upon clearing The Guide and takes place in the Spirit World. Before the stage begins, Unalaq tells Korra she is to late, as Harmonic Convergence is upon them, that nothing can stop him. Korra tells him to top talking and start fighting. The missions consist of:
paragraphs.text: This stage is unlocked upon clearing The Guide and takes place in the Spirit World. Before the stage begins, Unalaq tells Korra she is to late, as Harmonic Convergence is upon them, that nothing can stop him. Korra tells him to top talking and start fighting. The missions consist of:

paragraphs.body: Stop the Dark Avatar
paragraphs.text: Stop the Dark Avatar

paragraphs.body: Stop the Dark Avatar in 2:00
paragraphs.text: Stop the Dark Avatar in 2:00

paragraphs.body: The stage is very straightforward, consisting only of a fight with Unalaq. During the fight, Unalaq uses many ranged ice attacks and blocks all of Korra's ranged attacks. Unalaq can also summon dark spirits to help him. Upon defeating him, an excerpt of "Darkness Falls" showing Unalaq extracting and destroying Raava, growing to gigantic proportions, and leaving through the spirit lights is shown. The game tells that the era of the Avatar is not over yet, and that Korra can still connect to the cosmos.

paragraphs.body: The stages Rebel Spirit and The Southern Lights are based on "${link_0}".
paragraphs.text: The stages Rebel Spirit and The Southern Lights are based on "The Southern Lights".

paragraphs.body: In the advanced ability tab, the levels at which double jump and air dash are unlocked are switched.
paragraphs.text: In the advanced ability tab, the levels at which double jump and air dash are unlocked are switched.

paragraphs.body: Upon the release of the ninth stage, it appears that its title was swapped with the eighth stage's title.
paragraphs.text: Upon the release of the ninth stage, it appears that its title was swapped with the eighth stage's title.

paragraphs.body: When new stages were released as Book Two aired, some dots denoting stages changed their positions. Some of the marked locations these marked included the Northern Water Tribe and Si Wong Desert.

paragraphs.body: Some missions contain bugs, making them unachievable. For example, there are not 200 orbs to collect in "The Guide".
